Package org.jbones.datastore

Objects and services related to relational database-based persistance.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ADAOJDBC
    Class for archiving and unarchiving JDBC data transfer objects in the abstract sence.
    ADTO
    Class that represents a archivable data transfer object.
    BridgeDAOJDBC
    Class for deleting JDBC data transfer objects in the abstract sence.
    ConnectionPool
    Simple connection object pool.
    ConnectionPoolJDBC
    Basic JDBC Connection Pool ...
    ConnectionWrapperJDBC
    Simple database connection wrapper.
    DAOFactoryJDBC  
    DAOJDBC
    Class for accessing JDBC datasources to populate data transfer objects with data in the abstract sense.
    DDAOJDBC
    Class for deleting JDBC data transfer objects in the abstract sence.
    DDTO
    Class that represents a deletable data transfer object.
    JDBCCriteria
    Class that represents a Criteria object.
    Main
    Main class of the jbones datastore package.
    Sequence
    Class that represents a sequence object in the abstract sense.
    SequenceJDBC
    Class that represents an sql sequence object.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionException
    Class that represents an exception occured during a process on an object that implements some interface that contains a method of this exception's name.
    SequenceException
    Class that represents an exception occured during a process on an object that implements some interface that contains a method of this exception's name.

Package org.jbones.datastore Description

Objects and services related to relational database-based persistance.

Package Specification

based on jdk 1.3
